body1.description: First convex body used, wildcards can be used

body2.description: Second convex body used, wildcards can be used

r1Joints.description: Active joints used to avoid the collision (default: none, unspecified: all)

r2Joints.description: Active joints used to avoid the collision (default: none, unspecified: all)

r1InactiveJoints.description: Joints not used to avoid the collision (default: none). Has no effect if r1Joints isn't empty.

r2InactiveJoints.description: Joints not used to avoid the collision (default: none). Has no effect if r2Joints isn't empty.
